And when Tiffa shows Garrod the Gundam X, Garrod can do nothing but bear witness to the suddenly changing times. He may learn that people's true intentions run far deeper, and that the Vultures and Captain Jamil Neate are their only hope for surviving the coming age, and the birth of the New Earth Federation.\n\nMust mankind repeat the tragic mistake of the past? Even just the long-running serial works are diverse, such as fairy tales, gags, and fantasy, and each of the works written in between , each of which is unique.\nThis collection of works is a collection of masterpieces that gives a glimpse of the trajectory of Cat Cross Society's works, which have such a variety of faces, mainly short works.\n\"Woman of the Jewel\" is a unique work of aesthetics that borrows the form of non-fiction, set in the overripe Paris of the early 19th century.\n\"Hibi no Bubbles\" is a gem that uses fantastic motifs to lightly draw various thoughts that arise from everyday life and sublimate them emotionally.\n\"Venus Chair\" is a love story that touches the heart of a woman who suddenly finds herself returning to herself.\nAnd \"Shishi no Iru Sato\" and \"Suisui Houroki\" are the ultimate fantasy works.\nInspired by folk mythology, this work will make you feel comfortable and intoxicated with the calm and limitless salvation from the other side of life and death.\nHere time as we know it stops and a world of dreams emerges.\nEach work is colorful, and the underlying theme is the joy and pain of living.\nThis earnest thought is depicted lightly, happily, and painfully."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/猫十字社-ebook/dp/B077HFKRLN/ref=tmm_kin_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8\u0026qid=\u0026sr=","bw":"de9287b96e-6071-4a1d-abf9-e27f76ea2106","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/433521/","mu":"pumeh6s"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"suggestive"}

Instead, he transmigrated into the body of Shen Qingqiu, the titular \"scum villain\" who, in the novel's canon, eventually gets killed by the actual protagonist Luo Binghe for being a sadist teacher. af1472ad-4d18-4e41-8684-64616c87b0d0:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"af1472ad-4d18-4e41-8684-64616c87b0d0","title":{"en":"Empty Heart"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Empty Heart〜偽りの恋だから〜"},{"en":"Empty Heart: False Love"},{"en":"Empty Heart: Itsuwari no Koi Dakara"}],"lastChapter":"2.5","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","pl","it","hu","tr"],"description":{"en":"Jun's unspoken love for Ryuuta is a secret to everyone – except Ryuuta's little brother, Takumi, who would love to have Jun to himself. Now in high school, Takumi is student while Jun is teacher, and Ryuuta is moving on with his life. Takumi offers himself to Jun as a substitute for his brother, but will it be enough to fill their empty hearts?","pl":"Jun Usami jest nauczycielem plastyki w liceum. Ryuuta to jego najlepszy przyjaciel. Takumi to brat Ryuuty i uczeń Juna. Usami zakochał się w Ryuucie w liceum. Takumi w Usamim, kiedy zobaczył go całującego Ryuutę. Kiedy ten ostatni ogłasza, że się żeni, Takumi próbuje wykorzystać szansę jako… substytut własnego brata. Mamy więc trójkąt miłosny, który wydaje się już wystarczająco pogmatwany - jednak nie dla autorki. Minase nie byłaby sobą, gdyby nie skomplikowała tego jeszcze bardziej. Więc pojawia się były kochanek Juna, który musi dodać swoje trzy grosze - skłócić kogo się da, w dodatku stwierdzić, że on tylko pomaga i w ogóle wszyscy powinni być mu wdzięczni. Ale! Minase również nie byłaby sobą, gdyby nie doprowadziła do szczęśliwego zakończenia."},"links":{"al":"30989","ap":"empty-heart","kt":"2158","mal":"989","mu":"2561"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}

It leads to an era where they age human blood like wine. Harry, the chairman of Kingston Winery, the leading company in the business, loses his company to his older brother Max. Kicked out of the company that was once his, Harry is now running a small wine bar in Korea, where he also trades blood illegally. Then one day, a called Yeonseo visits the wine bar. Harry senses that even though her blood is now immature, it could be worth a lot of money when aged properly. Since Yeonseo needed money desperately, she makes an exclusive contract to sell her blood for 300k won per pack. Harry tries to age her blood to make some top-quality wine, to get back in business. And that’s when interracial romance begins…\n\n---\n\n- Official Simplified Chinese Translation:\n\n  * [kuaikan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5083/)\n\n  * The people of this society were especially skilled at genetic engineering. Using gene manipulation, they were able to develop special designer pets and store their genetic information on stone tablets known as \"disks\", similar to CDs. Using these disks, the artificial animals could be regenerated at special shrines.\n\nHowever, war broke out between the countries of the civilization. The pets were modified into biological weapons, and the war of the monsters began. The great civilizations completely annihilated each other, leaving nothing but relics behind, and much of the world's technology was lost. The monsters were sealed into their mystery disks and hidden away.\n\nCenturies later, as humanity was just beginning to rediscover basic technology, people found the artifacts owned by the so-called \"Ancients\" and attributed divine properties to them. They also discovered the lost disks and shrines. Using these, monsters were again born. Only through the power of the phoenix could the lost discs be revived back into living monsters.\n\nThus started a popular new sport, Monster Breeding. Breeders or trainers raised monsters for battle to compete in nation-wide tournaments to see who could raise the strongest beast."},"links":{"mu":"mh4pns8"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

Ela acreditava que Arisa levava uma vida escolar feliz. Mas após a súbita tentativa de suicídio de Arisa, Tsubasa promete encontrar o motivo por trás das ações de sua irmã gêmea, tomando seu lugar na escola. Mas será que esta vida era alegre demais para Tsubasa lidar?
